overview:
Dave is a web content strategist, constantly on the lookout for opportunities to match web technology with customer requirements in effective and creative ways.

Dave has been creating web content since 1994, Originally trained in graphic design, but with a good knowledge of programming, he has added a variety of web development skills over the years. Dave is committed to constantly improve his knowledge is areas including: web standards, usability, accessibility, interaction design

Now working for KMP Interactive Marketing and Technology, he splits his time between : Research and Development to explore the possibilities of new and established technologies. Product management of online applications. Consulting with clients to define requirements and solutions for online marketing and promotion projects.

Dave also regularly speaks at KMP’s seminars on the subjects of Social Media Marketing and Web Content Strategy

image.attribution: Dave Kinsella / Web Developer 2.0
